item.title: ZenFocus Changelogs
item.description:
🎉 v0.3.0 New Features

  • Add Scheduled date to tasks! - Add scheduled dates to your tasks using @ as a trigger.
  • Add Category - Instead of using @ for category, use # now(since @ is used for scheduled date.
  • Removed direct focus start session - Now you have to properly plan your day and prioritize your tasks in order to start a focus session.

🎉 v0.2.9 New Features

  • Two-Level Hierarchy Support! - Organize your tasks with enhanced structure using our new two-level hierarchy system.
  • Better Stats View - Supports stats for both parent and child categories for better overview of where your time is being spent.

⚠️ Important Migration Note

To take advantage of the new hierarchy feature, you'll need to migrate your existing data to the new format. The app will guide you through this process during the first launch.

🛠️ Bug Fixes & Improvements

  • Fixed stats view not updating properly
  • Resolved inconsistencies in completed task history view
  • Enhanced task editing stability and consistency

🤝 Community & Feedback

Join our growing community! Share your thoughts, get insights on upcoming features, or suggest improvements in our Discord channel.
